Name: Yoshimitsu Hatsumi
About the game: Yoshimitsu Hatsumi is an addictive mix of RPG and classic side-scrolling combat. Kill your enemies. FEATURES Yoshimitsu and Hatsumi: Epic battle sequences similar to street Fighter. in this action-packed, adrenaline-filled action RPG. Simple motion controls with great 3D animations. Discover the beauty of high quality graphics Challenge yourself in challenging battles Become a master samurai now!
